results.name: Number of distinct prime factors of n-th term of Look and Say Sequence A005150.
mathematica: s[1]=1; s[n_] := s[n] = FromDigits[ Flatten[{ IntegerDigits@ Length@ #, First@ #} & /@ Split[ IntegerDigits@ s[n-1] ]]]; PrimeNu /@ s /@ Range[15] (* _Giovanni Resta_, May 20 2020 *)
results.author: _Joseph L. Pe_, Jan 25 2003
